successes.title: The World's First Full HD 360° Camera
successes.description: The 360cam delivers easy real time streaming video over WiFi, recorded video, and still photos in the palm of your hand

Pledges.description: SUPPORTER: To say a heartfelt Thank You for believing in us, we’ll post your name on our web site and send you updates on 360cam.

AMBASSADOR: Proudly show your support and enthusiasim for the 360cam with a one of a kind grey, 360cam t-shirt! Sizes X, M, L, XL.  Plus: Thank you on our website! US&EU shipping included. EU residents please add $5 for VAT. Add $15 USD to ship outside US&EU.

SUPER EARLY BIRD: Super Special price on a first production 360cam! A savings of 50% off the retail value! Plus: Thank you on our website! US&EU shipping included. EU residents please add $50 for VAT. Add $20 USD to ship outside US&EU.

EARLY BIRD: Special price on a first production 360cam. Save $200 of the retail price. Plus: Thank you on our website! US&EU shipping included. EU residents please add $60 for VAT. Add $20 USD to ship outside US&EU.

PIONEER: Super deal on a first production 360cam and a set of Underwater Lens cups. Save $200 off the retail price. Plus: Thank you on our website! US&EU shipping included. EU residents please add $65 for VAT. Add $20 to ship outside US&EU.

KICKSTARTER: We ship you a first production 360cam, a set of Underwater Lens cups.  Savings $180 of the retail value. Plus: Thank you on our website! US&EU shipping included. EU residents please add $70 for VAT. Add $20 USD to ship outside US&EU.

EXPLORER: We ship you a first production 360cam, a set of Underwater Lens cups and a Home Video Surveillance Bulb Adaptor. Save $210 off the retail price.  Expected availability November, 2014. Plus: Thank you on our website! US&EU shipping included. EU residents please add $116 for VAT. Add $20 USD to ship outside US&EU.

ENTERTAINER: We ship you a first production 360cam, a set of Underwater Lens cups and Ethernet Video Streaming Base. Save $300 off the retail price. Plus: Thank you on our website! US&EU shipping included. EU residents please add $138 for VAT. Add $20 USD to ship outside US&EU.

ADVENTURER: We ship you a first production 360cam with all accessories (A set of Underwater Lens Cups, Ethernet Video Streaming Base & Light Bulb Adaptor). Save $300 on retail price. Plus: Thank you on our website! US&EU shipping included. EU residents please add $138 for VAT. Add $20 USD to ship outside US&EU.

DEVELOPER - [8:23:08 AM] Natasha Kurtova: Do you see the opportunity to integrate the 360cam with your application? Get a 360cam prototype in September 2014. We will also ship you a first production 360cam with all the accessories (estimated delivery - November 2014). And we will feature your application on the Partners page of our website. US&EU Shipping included. Add $20 USD to ship outside US&EU.

VISIONARY - Do you see the opportunity to integrate the 360cam with your application but need to tune up the hardware? Get a 360cam prototype in September 2014.  We will also ship you a first production 360cam with all the accessories (estimated delivery November 2014). You will also receive15 hours of 360cam firmware adaptation by our team. And we will feature your application on the Partners page of our website. Add $20 USD to ship outside US&EU.
